About Me

Bio & Academics

Hi, I'm Vatsal Makwana, a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya. I discovered my passion for web development during my studies and have been honing my skills ever since.

I'm driven by the desire to create engaging and user-friendly interfaces. I enjoy tackling challenges, learning new technologies, and collaborating with others to bring ideas to life. Currently seeking opportunities to kickstart my career as a frontend developer.

Academic Background: Computer Engineering, Kadi Sarva Vishwavidyalaya, 2025

Projects

Cloud Sync – Cloud Storage Web App
Developed a secure, efficient, and user-friendly cloud storage application. Users can upload, manage, and access files from any device with an intuitive UI. Implemented real-time syncing and responsive design for all screen sizes.
GitHub Store-It
Video Conferencing Platform
Built a real-time meeting and video conferencing web application with scalable architecture. Integrated authentication and meeting controls for smooth collaboration. Provided seamless UI/UX for hosting and joining secure video calls.
GitHub Vatz-Zoom
Movie & TV Show Rating Platform
Created an interactive platform for discovering and rating movies and series. Users can view reviews, submit ratings, and receive personalized suggestions. Focused on dynamic UI and user engagement features.
GitHub Movie-Vatz
